name: JavaScript
desc: Leon writes JavaScript day-to-day and strives for simple and concise code, with progressive enhancements being a key foundation of his style.

name: CSS
desc: Leon is an advocate of CSS and aims to use CSS where appropriate rather than using JS as a sledgehammer for the same effect.

name: HTML
desc: Leon has been following HTML standards since learning about the power of semantic mark-up and how difficult browsing the web can be for those that rely on a developers understanding accessibility.

name: Node.js
desc: Leon has used Node extensively for local development setup and more recently in building the Capgemini Cloud Automation tool for SAP Systems.

name: React
desc: Leon has developed his own component-based interfaces in plain JS before beginning his React journey. Leon has since architected and delivered the Capgemini Advisory Solutions, built in React with Material UI.

name: SAPUI5
desc: Leon builds enterprise SAPUI5 applications in his day-job and is intimately familiar with the framework and it's shortcomings. This combined with Leons knowledge of the web makes him invaluable when advising on technologies and implementation/integration strategies.

name: Web APIs
desc: Leon follows Web Standards and is trying to engage with them at the explainer level to better understand and contribute to the growth of the web.

name: SAP
desc: Leon has worked on high-profile SAP projects, ranging from huge S/4hana transformations to customising Work Manager using open web extensions.

name: Fiori
desc: Leon is an expert in Fiori guidelines and has vast experience in designing and developing applications that adhere to Fiori design principles. Leon has been focused on developing additional capability within his team for Fiori in other frameworks such as React.

name: Design Thinking
desc: Leon is certified in the IDEO Design Thinking methodology and a vocal advocate of the accompanying toolset. Leon believes that collaboration is the cornerstone of success when delivering software.

name: Agile
desc: Leon is an evangelist for Agile Methodologies, showcasing the difference between a truly Agile delivery and enterprise Wagile/Waterfall. Leon is a certified Professional Scrum Master.

name: SCP
desc: Leon has worked with the SAP Cloud Platform (now named BTP) extensively and is knowledgeable in many areas of the services available, such as the mobile development kit and conversational AI.
